summary: Simple ftplugin for use with Windows PowerShell
name: Windows-PowerShell-File-Type-Plugin
description: Sets up a few simple things like comment tokens and configures gvim File Browse dialog. Best used with the Windows PowerShell Syntax file and Filetype Plugin file (vimscript #1327 and vimscript #1815).
install_details: Copy this file into your ftplugin folder (either $home\vimfiles\ftplugin or $ProgramFiles\vim\vimfiles\ftplugin).
